chunk:
No B.S. Gentle Foaming Cleanser (2019 formulation)

Brand: No b.s.

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Vera Gel Juice(SC), Lauramine Oxide(S), Cocamidopropyl Betaine(S), Glycerin(H), Lavender Oil(F), Green Tea Leaf Extract(SC), Cucumber Fruit Extract (EM) (SC), Phenoxyethanol(P), Ethylhexylglycerin (P).

Directions: Pump

.

Directions: Pump it up with a dollop of cleanser. Apply to wet skin and gently rub-a-dub using circular motions. Rinse well with warm water.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
